articles.content:

articles.author: Brian Hutton, Marie O'Halloran
articles.title: Poots accuses EU of using Northern Ireland ‘as a plaything’ - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Commission currently ‘don’t seem to care for the peace process’, says DUP leader
articles.content:
DUP leader Edwin Poots has accused the EU for using Northern Ireland as a plaything over Brexit.
